post.author: 권중석
post.content:
Position:                        Product Development Manager
Location:                        Toronto, ON (downtown)
Date:                        February 28th, 2005
Application Deadline:                        March 21st, 2005

Tutopia.ca is the perfect online marketplace for English learners.  
We use learner feedback to dynamically adjust the rankings of English instructors in our directory, and audio/video web conferencing to make quality English learning more accessible.

We are presently seeking to fill the position of Product Development Manager, reporting directly to the CEO.

The ideal candidate will have an entrepreneurial spirit, and would ideally have contributed to the success of a startup venture in the past.  Problem solving, thinking outside the box, effective communication and solid organizational skills are critical.  We place high value on team members who are disciplined, open-minded and willing to work long hours.  Knowledge of the ESL industry will be looked upon favourably.

Responsibilities

-  Take total ownership of product development
-  Lead the development team
-  Produce effective and well organized schedules at the weekly, monthly and total project levels
-  Effective execution of schedules

Skills

-  Knowledge of Flash Communication Server (or other            comparable technologies)
-  ASP, XML
-  MS SQL Server
-  IIS
-  Windows 2000/2003 Server, .NET architecture

To Apply

Submit your resume to david@tutopia.ca.
post.title: Looking for product development manager
